name: Sprite Fight
description:
Sprite Fight is a 2.5D isometric arena fighter that I made in 3 weeks as my final project for CIS4820.

I am very proud of this project since I received a 100% on it and I ended up completing CIS4820 with a 100%.

I plan on using Unity to learn more about proceduralism next or maybe programming my own ray marcher using the Unity engine.

Controls:
  1. W - A - S - D / Left Stick: Movement
  2. W - A - S - D + Spacebar / Left Stick + Circle/B: Roll
  3. Left Mouse Button (LMB) / R1: Basic Attack
  4. Right Mouse Button (RMB) / R2: Heavy Attack
  5. Left Shift / L1: Block / Parry
